attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Href for a button link, will switch the element tag to an <a> if an href is provided

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Full SVG string of an icon to be injected into component.

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: The text on the button. Overridden by the default prop.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type attribute of the underlying HTML button.

properties.name: href
properties.description: Href for a button link, will switch the element tag to an <a> if an href is provided

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Full SVG string of an icon to be injected into component.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text on the button. Overridden by the default prop.

properties.name: cssClassObject
properties.type: { default: string; prefix: string; size: { conditional: string; class: string; }; variant: { conditional: string; class: string; }; }

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type attribute of the underlying HTML button.

slots.description: Default slot, put whatever you want in here.

slots.name: content
slots.description: Insert content in the named "content" slot.
